tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transportation_infrastructure (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location POINT,
    road_name VARCHAR(255),
    road_type VARCHAR(50),
    road_condition VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE bridge_information (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bridge_name VARCHAR(255),
    location POINT,
    length FLOAT,
    height FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(255),
    route_description TEXT,
    route_length DOUBLE PRECISION,
    start_point_geom GEOMETRY(Point),
    end_point_geom GEOMETRY(Point)
)

CREATE TABLE transportation_stations (
    station_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    station_name VARCHAR(255),
    station_type VARCHAR(50),
    station_location GEOMETRY(Point),
    operational_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_signals (
    signal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    signal_name VARCHAR(255),
    signal_location GEOMETRY(Point),
    signal_type VARCHAR(50),
    activation_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE road_maintenance (
    maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    road_section GEOMETRY(LineString),
    maintenance_description TEXT,
    maintenance_cost DOUBLE
)

CREATE TABLE bridges (
  bridge_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bridge_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  construction_year INT,
  length_m DECIMAL(8,2),
  height_m DECIMAL(8,2)
);

CREATE TABLE tunnels (
  tunnel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tunnel_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  construction_year INT,
  length_m DECIMAL(8,2),
  diameter_m DECIMAL(8,2)
);

CREATE TABLE intersections (
  intersection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  intersection_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  latitude DECIMAL(10,6),
  longitude DECIMAL(10,6),
  intersection_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);
